definition: oilseed rape (Brassica napus)/flowering edible rape (Brassica chinensis var. oleifera)
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: The transgenic canola plants are not about to take over the world.
sentences.chinese: 转基因油菜作物不可能将一统天下。

sentences.english: In the springtime, yellow rape sead flower blossomed everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 在春天，到处开的都是黄色的油菜花。

sentences.english: Nyingchi in spring. The land becomes a sea of blossoming rape plants.
sentences.chinese: 林芝的春天，油菜花盛开的田野。

sentences.english: There are two ways in utilization of heterosis in rapeseed .
sentences.chinese: 油菜杂种优势利用途径主要有三系法和两系法。

sentences.english: Breeding and its culture technique of double lower hybrid Shaanyou No. 8 In Brassica napus L.
sentences.chinese: 双低油菜新品种陕油8号及其栽培技术。

sentences.english: Rape and barley are grown is rotation here.
In late spring, the flowers of rape are blossoming wildly, alluring swarms of butterflies.
sentences.chinese: 暮春的油菜花一片放肆，粉蝶轰轰其上。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a rape drought-resistance seed-soaking agent and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种油菜抗旱浸种剂及其制备方法。

sentences.english: We want to buy Seafood, Sheepskins, Rapeseed, Edible Oils, Wheats , Gold Bullion.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购海鲜，羊皮，油菜籽，食品油，小麦。

sentences.english: Proper dolomite application significantly increased rapeseed yield in the acidic yellow-red soil.
sentences.chinese: 适当施用白云石粉能够极显著提高油菜产量。

sentences.english: Developing the idle land in winter in Yangtze River basin for expanding the acreage of rape.
sentences.chinese: 大力开发长江流域冬闲田土，扩大油菜种植面积。

sentences.english: Golden rape flower in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 金黄的油菜花在风中摇曳。

sentences.english: Yellow flower of rape always remind me of my childhood in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 黄黄的油菜花总使本人想起本人在乡村时的童年。

sentences.english: In the southern part of the country wheat is earing and rapeseed is in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 南国的小麦正在抽穗，油菜正在开花。

sentences.english: There's none so rare as. Can compare with King Cole, And his fiddles three.
sentences.chinese: 很少人能比得上，油菜王和他的三个提琴手。

sentences.english: Fungus dreg is unsuitable to be the culture medium of the Holy Land violet of rape.
sentences.chinese: 菌渣不适合作圣地紫罗兰油菜的栽培基质。

definition: Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
